name: MEC Sunnyday Surfari Sun Hat - Infants
description:
Safari level protection for your little explorer, made from lightweight, UV-blocking nylon.Quick-dry fabric has a DWR finish to shed summer rain.UPF 50+ rated material blocks more than 98% of UV.Polyester sweatband wicks moisture.Name label make the game of “whose is whose” easier.

        Sustainability
